New Records: The San Diego Padres became the first team in MLB postseason history to get six consecutive hits and hit for the cycle in the same inning.
Key Match Events: Kyle Higashioka hit a game-tying solo home run with two outs in the bottom of the second inning.
Manny Machado hit a two-RBI double to put San Diego on top.
Jackson Merrill hit a two-RBI triple to clear the bases.
Michael Harris II hit a two-run shot in the eighth inning for the Braves.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Max Fried was taken out of the game due to a hip injury suffered on a comebacker from Fernando Tatis Jr. in the first inning.
